com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.ui.views.storefront.StorefrontView
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.internal.Template, com.vaadin.flow.router.BeforeEnterObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.BeforeEnterHandler, HasLogger, EntityView<Order>, HasConfirmation, HasNotifications, Serializable
@Tag("storefront-view") @JsModule("./src/views/storefront/storefront-view.js") @Route(value="storefront/:orderID?", layout=MainView.class) @RouteAlias(value="storefront/:orderID/edit",layout=MainView.class) @RouteAlias(value="",layout=MainView.class) @PermitAll public class StorefrontView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.littemplate.LitTemplate implements HasLogger, com.vaadin.flow.router.BeforeEnterObserver, EntityView<Order>
